name: Festivals
description: Delhi bursts with energy during festivals like Diwali (Festival of Lights), Holi (Festival of Colors), and the grand Republic Day Parade.

name: Art & Theatre
description: The city has a thriving arts scene, with numerous galleries, and auditoriums like the National School of Drama (NSD) hosting regular plays.

name: Music Scene
description: From classical Indian music performances to modern indie bands, Delhi's diverse music scene caters to all tastes, with venues across the city.
